text:
A while after finishing the grand adventure to save the "Endangered World",
and witnessing the reunion of Barte and her master...

[Player] visited the Royal Palace of the Aradisia Kingdom
to see a certain individual.

The guards led them to a courtyard in the corridor
connected to the audience chamber.
As they waited there...

name: Gnomon
text:
Thank you for waiting.
It's been a while, [Player]-sama.

options.text: Gnomon-kun!
So you really are working at the palace...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's... of course I am.
I told you when we met before, didn't I?

name: Gnomon
text:
Thank you for coming all the way from Earth.
...So, what can I do for you?

options.text: Huh? I thought I said I was just coming to see you...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was only told that much beforehand.
Is that really all there is to it?

options.text: I just came to check in on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was only told that much beforehand.
Is that really all there is to it?

options.text: Can't I meet you unless I have business?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No!
That's not what I mean at all!
But... I'm at a loss.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1 or 2]

options.text: T-that's all there is to it...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I... I see...
I honestly thought there might be some other hidden agenda behind it.

options.text: You'd be troubled if I had no reason?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I... I see...
I honestly thought there might be some other hidden agenda behind it.

name: Gnomon
text:
I've never met someone without a specific purpose before.
I don't know what to do or what to talk about...

name: Gnomon
text:
The Commander even sent me away,
saying I was supposed to have the day off...
Hmm...

Gnomon fidgeted with his staff,
his gaze wandering aimlessly,
seemingly searching for words to speak.

options.text: You weren't that bad at talking, were you?
You were so eloquent in that other world.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah... when I was over there...
I only spoke because there were things I had to say.

name: Gnomon
text:
Otherwise, I wouldn't have been able to serve as a navigator.
Besides, everyone who came to see me there had a purpose.

name: Gnomon
text:
So... well.
In cases where they don't,
I don't really know what to talk about...

options.text: First, tell me how you've been.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? Oh, yes.
Well, not much time has passed since then,
so there haven't been many changes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right now, I've joined the Aradisia Kingdom's Cavalry as an
apprentice soldier and currently undergoing training.

options.text: Oh, right, you joined the cavalry, didn't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh? Oh, right.
I'm an apprentice soldier and currently undergoing training.

options.text: That's kinda cute...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't tease me.
I'm genuinely troubled by this, in my own way.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

options.text: Sorry, sorry. How have you been?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? Oh, yes.
Well, not much time has passed since then, so there haven't been many changes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text: Right now, I've joined the Aradisia Kingdom's Cavalry as an apprentice soldier and currently undergoing training.

options.text: Yeah, just tell me what's new.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? Oh, yes.
Well, not much time has passed since then, so there haven't been many changes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text: Right now, I've joined the Aradisia Kingdom's Cavalry as an  apprentice soldier and currently undergoing training.

name: Gnomon
text:
Even though I'm a cavalry soldier,
I've never handled a sword,
so I'm training from the very basics.

name: Gnomon
text:
I've started to build up my physical strength...
and only then I've realized how much I relied on 'magic' to live.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's common for me to be so exhausted by the end of training
that I just fall asleep without even getting any 'magic' research done...

options.text: So was it inconvenient after all?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'd be lying if I said that I didn't feel inconvenient.
Even though much of it was lost, the accumulation of thousands of years of scientific technology seemed to have been vast.

options.text: You're doing some pretty tough training...
It must take a lot of time to gather "magic," too.

name: Gnomon
text:
...But, it's not a bad feeling.
I've never experienced a life surrounded
by so many people before.

name: Gnomon
text:
If I had stayed in that other world,
my life probably would have ended in
such a limited circle of people.

name: Gnomon
text:
Besides, it's not like the 'magic' gathering isn't progressing at all.
The other day, I even mastered a 'magic' to remove alcohol from alcoholic beverages.

name: Gnomon
text:
If the experiment I'm currently working on succeeds,
I might even acquire a 'magic' that can instantly
dry a wet cloth the size of a hand towel.

options.text: Uh huh...
I suppose it could be useful...
Hmm, it's kinda lame...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Well, you see.
In this world, I'm making material coins by hand
and manually converting and inputting codes myself—

name: Gnomon
text:
So there are definitely limits.
Plus, 'magic' is like the culmination of multiple
kinds of trivial techniques piling up...

name: Gnomon
text:
I'm just taking it one step at a time...
Oh... I just called it 'trivial' myself.
It's all over now...

Gnomon sighed.
He tapped his staff against his shoulder,
which was probably stiff.

options.text: Are you regretting it, after all...?
Do you wish you could go back to your original world?

name: Gnomon
text:
No. I admit that it was an arduous journey.
Even so, I have no regrets about coming to this world whatsoever.

name: Gnomon
text:
I've already fulfilled my mission in that world.
Thanks to everyone, the 'rift' has been closed.

name: Gnomon
text:
Conversely, I didn't have any goals beyond that...
But now, I've found new ones.

name: Gnomon
text:
There's so much I need to learn, and there's so much I want to learn.
Surely, the life that is 'my own'... has just only begun.

options.text: That's good to know...!
Enjoy your life however you like.

text:
As Gnomon nodded in response,
the bell from the tower above rang out across the area.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's just about lunchtime.
[Player]-sama, since you're already here.
Would you like to accompany me for a meal?

name: Gnomon
text:
The other day, His Majesty,
who for some reason knows a lot about the town below,
recommended a few eateries.
I'd be happy to be your guide.

options.text: Sounds good, let's go!
"For some reason," huh...
Surely, it's not potato dishes, right...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, of course not...
I mean, the Korphen family here are indeed
potato farmers, and I do like potatoes...

name: Gnomon
text:
Now then, shall we go?
...[Player]-sama.
Would you mind lending me your hand?

[Player] offered a hand as requested.
Gnomon then took that hand and squeezed it tightly.

options.text: G-Gnomon!?
Is it really okay to do this...!?
I didn't expect you to come on to me...!

name: Gnomon
text:
There's one more thing that makes me happy.
You, Hydoor-sama, Barte-sama, Danzo-sama...

name: Gnomon
text:
It's being in a world where I can meet all of you whenever I want.
If I hadn't crossed worlds at that time...

name: Gnomon
text:
I wouldn't have been able to see any of you again.
That's why... I want to cherish the 'bonds' I formed on that journey.

Gnomon's gaze, as he said this,
went to the hand he was holding tightly.

Gnomon's face gradually turned red.
You can feel the heat from the hand
holding yours slowly rising.

options.text: A-Are you okay...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
M-my apologies...
I tried to be brave and let myself follow my feelings,
but once I actually realized it...

options.text: I guess it is kinda embarrassing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
M-my apologies...
I tried to be brave and let myself follow my feelings,
but once I actually realized it...

options.text: Thank you for being brave.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-sama...
I feel like you're seeing right through my heart, and it's embarrassing...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Well, let's get going.
Since I've been given this free time,
I can't let it go to waste.

name: Gnomon
text:
Please... allow me to enjoy the
happiness of spending time with you.

Though still a little awkward,
Gnomon tries his best to escort [Player].
Warmly watching over his budding courage—

note: The location name is スタルト (Start), but I haven't played this game long enough to make sure that's the correct pronounciation of it
text:
[Player] thoroughly enjoyed their vacation in the
royal capital of Start, just the two of them.
